yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Chimes of Freedom (EP) | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="This four-track, live EP was released to benefit the Amnesty International Human Rights Now! Tour." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/chimes-of-freedom/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Chimes of Freedom" />
<meta property="og:description" content="This four-track, live EP was released to benefit the Amnesty International Human Rights Now! Tour. Springsteen announced his involvement in the tour during a show in Stockholm, just prior to the band’s performance of Bob Dylan’s “Chimes of Freedom,” as featured on the EP. Other tracks were selected from earlier tour stops in Detroit and Los Angeles." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/chimes-of-freedom/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Bruce Springsteen" />

	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1200" />
	<meta property="og:image:height" content="630" />
	<meta property="og:image:type" content="image/jpeg" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<meta name="twitter:title" content="Chimes of Freedom" />
<meta name="twitter:description" content="This four-track, live EP was released to benefit the Amnesty International Human Rights Now! Tour. Springsteen announced his involvement in the tour during a show in Stockholm, just prior to the band’s performance of Bob Dylan’s “Chimes of Freedom,” as featured on the EP. Other tracks were selected from earlier tour stops in Detroit and Los Angeles." />
<meta name="twitter:image" content="https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/e8622626f9584d40b1a8fce8dfa6f567/wp-content/uploads/1988/08/og-springsteen-chimes-freedom-front.jpg" />
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@springsteen" />

yoast_head_json.title: Chimes of Freedom (EP) | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: This four-track, live EP was released to benefit the Amnesty International Human Rights Now! Tour.
yoast_head_json.og_description: This four-track, live EP was released to benefit the Amnesty International Human Rights Now! Tour. Springsteen announced his involvement in the tour during a show in Stockholm, just prior to the band’s performance of Bob Dylan’s “Chimes of Freedom,” as featured on the EP. Other tracks were selected from earlier tour stops in Detroit and Los Angeles.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: This four-track, live EP was released to benefit the Amnesty International Human Rights Now! Tour. Springsteen announced his involvement in the tour during a show in Stockholm, just prior to the band’s performance of Bob Dylan’s “Chimes of Freedom,” as featured on the EP. Other tracks were selected from earlier tour stops in Detroit and Los Angeles.
